import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{// Fetch products
axios.get('http://localhost:3001/products').then(res=>setProducts(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error(err));},[]);const createOrder=productId=>{axios.post('http://localhost:3002/orders',{productId:productId,quantity:1}).then(res=>{alert('Order created!');setOrders([...orders,res.data]);}).catch(err=>console.error(err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"E-Commerce Store"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'10px',margin:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>createOrder(product.id),children:"Buy Now"})]},product.id))})]});}export default App;
